question: What is the significance of the 27th day of fasting
answer:
QUESTION
What is the significance of the 27th day of fasting. Also what does it mean to dream of a dog
ANSWER


Share:
You are probably enquiring about the 27 fast of Ramadhaan. Every fast of Ramadhaan has great virtue and reward.

It is possible that Laylatul Qadr is in the last ten days of Ramadhaan. Some Ulama believe that Laylatul Qadr is on the 27 night of Ramadhaan.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
